de.weltraumschaf.commons.swing

Class MenuBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.commons.swing.MenuBuilder

  • public final class MenuBuilder
extends Object
    Builder to create a menu.

    You should not use this class directly. Instead use MenuBarBuilder.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private JMenu menu
      The built menu.
      private MenuBarBuilder parent
      The menu bar builder which creates the menu bar to which menu will belong.

      • MenuBuilder

        MenuBuilder(String name,

        parent - Constructing menu bar builder.

        Get the built menu.
